PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_AlignmentCantSegmentCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of all instances of alignment cant segment.

PropertyDef.Name: CantDeficiency
PropertyDef.Definition: Difference between applied cant and a higher equilibrium cant.

PropertyDef.Name: CantEquilibrium
PropertyDef.Definition: Cant at a particular speed at which the vehicle will have a resultant force perpendicular to the running plane.

PropertyDef.Name: StartSmoothingLength
PropertyDef.Definition: Length for the circular transition change of curvature at the start of the cant segment, measured from the start of the cant segment to the end of the circular transition change of curvature.

PropertyDef.Name: EndSmoothingLength
PropertyDef.Definition: Length for the circular transition change of curvature at the end of the cant segment, measured from the start of the circular transition change of curvature to the end of the cant segment.
